thread.section_title: Bravofly.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bravofly.com | www.bravofly.com
thread.title: Denes Zalan

author: Denes Zalan
title: Denes Zalan
text: I booked a trip and misclicked the month for the return flight. I called the "customer care" immediately - charging me 5 euros. They promised multiple options as solutions. Within 1 hour I received two emails saying that any changes to the bookings are impossible but if I still want to change I can call again. And of course charge me 5 euros again for nothing. Bravofly is a scam.
